info.author: Thierry Parmentelat, Tony Mack, Scott Baker
info.description:
Purpose

This software implements a wrapper for the SFA (Slice-based Federation Architecture) that allows networking testbeds to interoperate in terms of exposing and provisioning resources. It comes with drivers for a few testbeds, notably PlanetLab and IotLab.

References

  • This page describes the motivation behind this software
  • Refer to this trac page for installing and using this software
  • The GENI community has a page on the Aggregate API

info.name: sfa
info.summary: SFA Wrapper with drivers for PlanetLab and IotLab and others
info.html_description: <h1>Purpose</h1> <p>This software implements a wrapper for the SFA (Slice-based Federation Architecture) that allows networking testbeds to interoperate in terms of exposing and provisioning resources. It comes with drivers for a few testbeds, notably PlanetLab and IotLab.</p> <h1>References</h1> <ul> <li><a href=”http://sfawrap.info”>This page</a> describes the motivation behind this software</li> <li>Refer to <a href=”http://svn.planet-lab.org/wiki/SFATutorial#SFATutorial”>this trac page</a> for installing and using this software</li> <li>The GENI community has <a href=”http://groups.geni.net/geni/wiki/GeniApi”>a page on the Aggregate API</a></li> </ul>
